Add debugging for pitch detection issues

- Add better error handling in pitch detector
- Add console logging to track audio callbacks
- Add try-catch for Pitchfinder initialization
- Log pitch detection results for first 5 callbacks
- Log when target is hit

This will help diagnose why pitch isn''t updating in real-time.

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix pitch detection with improved autocorrelation

- Switch to unpkg CDN for Pitchfinder (better compatibility)
- Completely rewrite autocorrelation algorithm:
  - Use proper normalized autocorrelation
  - Add peak detection to avoid octave errors
  - Add parabolic interpolation for accuracy
  - Limit search to human voice range (80-1000Hz)
  - Lower RMS threshold for better sensitivity
- Should now continuously update pitch display

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
